creator: marktguru Deutschland GmbH
descriptionHtml:
marktguru is a location-based service helping users to find offers, leaflets, brochures, stores and opening hours in the vicinity of the users geolocation. Furthermore, the user has the chance to save real cash on his in-store or online purchases by using marktguru cashback deals.

marktguru offers you numerous advantages:
» Leaflets, offers, promotions, catalogs, brochures, flyers and coupons from your favorite retailers - and that in an environmentally friendly way and without paper waste.
» Find the best offers and discounts.
» Cashback: save money quickly and easily.
This is how it works:
1) Select a cashback offer in the app
2) Buy a cashback product
3) Take a photo of the receipt and upload it to the app
4) Get cash back
» Opening hours: at marktguru you will find shops and chain stores as well as their opening hours in your area.

The functions at a glance:
» Invite your friends to marktguru and get additional cashback credit.
» Search for individual products or brands and find out where they are currently on sale.
» Set your favorites and get notified as soon as there are new leaflets from your favorite retailers or your favorite products on offer.
» Put products directly from the brochure onto your shopping list and create your personal grocery list.
» Use promo codes to unlock exclusive cashback deals.

marktguru provides everything:
Leaflets and offers for many supermarkets, discounters, electro markets, hardware stores, sports shops, furniture stores, drugstores, organic markets, etc.
Current offers of various retailers, stores and shops, such as Kaufland, Aldi, Netto, Media Markt, Real, -, Norma, Müller Drogeriemarkt, Rossmann, Metro, Edeka, NKD, Saturn, Roller, McDonald's, Galeria Kaufhof, denn’s Biomarkt, Kentucky Fried Chicken, toom Getränkemarkt, Zoo & Co

The number and selection of the displayed leaflets vary, as it often depends upon the cooperation of the retailers.

We work hard every day to show you more content and to further enhance your experience with the marktguru app. Your feedback is important to us!
You are still missing retailers, products or brands? Do you have questions, problems or feedback for us? Please contact us anytime at feedback@marktguru.de

We hope you enjoy the bargain hunting and saving money with the marktguru app.

Your marktgurus
descriptionShort: Don’t miss the best deals & offers for your next purchase.

- We improved our design and performance and fixed several bugs.

title: marktguru - leaflets, offers & cashback

creator: marktguru Deutschland GmbH
descriptionHtml:
marktguru is a location-based service helping users to find offers, leaflets, brochures, stores and opening hours in the vicinity of the users geolocation. Furthermore, the user has the chance to save real cash on his in-store or online purchases by using marktguru cashback deals.

marktguru offers you numerous advantages:
» Leaflets, offers, promotions, catalogs, brochures, flyers and coupons from your favorite retailers - and that in an environmentally friendly way and without paper waste.
» Find the best offers and discounts.
» Cashback: save money quickly and easily.
This is how it works:
1) Select a cashback offer in the app
2) Buy a cashback product
3) Take a photo of the receipt and upload it to the app
4) Get cash back
» Opening hours: at marktguru you will find shops and chain stores as well as their opening hours in your area.

The functions at a glance:
» Invite your friends to marktguru and get additional cashback credit.
» Search for individual products or brands and find out where they are currently on sale.
» Set your favorites and get notified as soon as there are new leaflets from your favorite retailers or your favorite products on offer.
» Put products directly from the brochure onto your shopping list and create your personal grocery list.
» Use promo codes to unlock exclusive cashback deals.

marktguru provides everything:
Leaflets and offers for many supermarkets, discounters, electro markets, hardware stores, sports shops, furniture stores, drugstores, organic markets, etc.
Current offers of various retailers, stores and shops, such as Kaufland, Aldi, Netto, Media Markt, Real, -, Norma, Müller Drogeriemarkt, Rossmann, Metro, Edeka, NKD, Saturn, Roller, McDonald's, Galeria Kaufhof, denn’s Biomarkt, Kentucky Fried Chicken, toom Getränkemarkt, Zoo & Co
The number and selection of the displayed leaflets vary, as it often depends upon the cooperation of the retailers.

Cashback for online purchases:
There are now cashback deals at numerous online shops available: OTTO, Saturn, Deichmann, Smyths Toys, Ernsting’s family, AliExpress, Lidl.de, Thalia, flaconi, Fressnapf, lieferando.de, ...

We work hard every day to show you more content and to further enhance your experience with the marktguru app. Your feedback is important to us!

marktguru is a location-based service helping users to find offers, leaflets, brochures, stores and opening hours in the vicinity of the users geolocation. Furthermore, the user has the chance to save real cash on his in-store or online purchases by using marktguru cashback deals.

marktguru offers you numerous advantages:
» Leaflets, offers, promotions, catalogs, brochures, flyers and coupons from your favorite retailers - and that in an environmentally friendly way and without paper waste.
» Find the best offers and discounts.
» Cashback: save money quickly and easily.
This is how it works:
1) Select a cashback offer in the app
2) Buy a cashback product
3) Take a photo of the receipt and upload it to the app
4) Get cash back
» Opening hours: at marktguru you will find shops and chain stores as well as their opening hours in your area.

The functions at a glance:
» Invite your friends to marktguru and get additional cashback credit.
» Search for individual products or brands and find out where they are currently on sale.
» Set your favorites and get notified as soon as there are new leaflets from your favorite retailers or your favorite products on offer.
» Put products directly from the brochure onto your shopping list and create your personal grocery list.
» Use promo codes to unlock exclusive cashback deals.

marktguru provides everything:
Leaflets and offers for many supermarkets, discounters, electro markets, hardware stores, sports shops, furniture stores, drugstores, organic markets, etc.
Current offers of various retailers, stores and shops, such as Kaufland, Aldi, Netto, Media Markt, Real, -, Norma, Müller Drogeriemarkt, Rossmann, Metro, Edeka, NKD, Saturn, Roller, McDonald's, Galeria Kaufhof, denn’s Biomarkt, Kentucky Fried Chicken, toom Getränkemarkt, Zoo & Co
The number and selection of the displayed leaflets vary, as it often depends upon the cooperation of the retailers.

Cashback for online purchases:
There are now cashback deals at numerous online shops available: OTTO, Saturn, Deichmann, Smyths Toys, Ernsting’s family, AliExpress, Lidl.de, Thalia, flaconi, Fressnapf, lieferando.de, ...

We work hard every day to show you more content and to further enhance your experience with the marktguru app. Your feedback is important to us!
You are still missing retailers, products or brands? Do you have questions, problems or feedback for us? Please contact us anytime at feedback@marktguru.de

We hope you enjoy the bargain hunting and saving money with the marktguru app.

Your marktgurus
descriptionShort: Don’t miss the best deals & offers for your next purchase.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We improved our design and performance and fixed some bugs.
--------------------------------
Do you like marktguru? We're looking forward to your 5*-Rating!
Do you have any questions? Just contact us via the feedback button within the app or send us a message to support@marktguru.de

descriptionHtml:
marktguru is a location-based service helping users to find offers, leaflets, brochures, stores and opening hours in the vicinity of the users geolocation. Furthermore, the user has the chance to save real cash on his in-store or online purchases by using marktguru cashback deals.

marktguru offers you numerous advantages:
» Leaflets, offers, promotions, catalogs, brochures, flyers and coupons from your favorite retailers - and that in an environmentally friendly way and without paper waste.
» Find the best offers and discounts.
» Cashback: save money quickly and easily.
This is how it works:
1) Select a cashback offer in the app
2) Buy a cashback product
3) Take a photo of the receipt and upload it to the app
4) Get cash back
» Opening hours: at marktguru you will find shops and chain stores as well as their opening hours in your area.

The functions at a glance:
» Invite your friends to marktguru and get additional cashback credit.
» Search for individual products or brands and find out where they are currently on sale.
» Set your favorites and get notified as soon as there are new leaflets from your favorite retailers or your favorite products on offer.
» Put products directly from the brochure onto your shopping list and create your personal grocery list.
» Use promo codes to unlock exclusive cashback deals.

marktguru provides everything:
Leaflets and offers for many supermarkets, discounters, electro markets, hardware stores, sports shops, furniture stores, drugstores, organic markets, etc.
Current offers of various retailers, stores and shops, such as Kaufland, Aldi, Netto, Media Markt, Real, -, Norma, Müller Drogeriemarkt, Rossmann, Metro, Edeka, NKD, Saturn, Roller, McDonald's, Galeria Kaufhof, denn’s Biomarkt, Kentucky Fried Chicken, toom Getränkemarkt, Zoo & Co
The number and selection of the displayed leaflets vary, as it often depends upon the cooperation of the retailers.

Cashback for online purchases:
There are now cashback deals at numerous online shops available: OTTO, Saturn, Deichmann, Smyths Toys, Ernsting’s family, AliExpress, Lidl.de, Thalia, flaconi, Fressnapf, lieferando.de, ...

We work hard every day to show you more content and to further enhance your experience with the marktguru app. Your feedback is important to us!
You are still missing retailers, products or brands? Do you have questions, problems or feedback for us? Please contact us anytime at feedback@marktguru.de

We hope you enjoy the bargain hunting and saving money with the marktguru app.

Your marktgurus
descriptionShort: Don’t miss the best deals & offers for your next purchase.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We improved our design and performance and fixed some bugs.
--------------------------------
Do you like marktguru? We're looking forward to your 5*-Rating!
Do you have any questions? Just contact us via the feedback button within the app or send us a message to support@marktguru.de

title: marktguru - leaflets & offers

creator: marktguru Deutschland GmbH
descriptionHtml:
marktguru is a location-based service helping users to find offers, leaflets, brochures, stores and opening hours in the vicinity of the users geolocation. Furthermore, the user has the chance to save real cash on his in-store or online purchases by using marktguru cashback deals.

marktguru offers you numerous advantages:
» Leaflets, offers, promotions, catalogs, brochures, flyers and coupons from your favorite retailers - and that in an environmentally friendly way and without paper waste.
» Find the best offers and discounts.
» Cashback: save money quickly and easily.
This is how it works:
1) Select a cashback offer in the app
2) Buy a cashback product
3) Take a photo of the receipt and upload it to the app
4) Get cash back
» Opening hours: at marktguru you will find shops and chain stores as well as their opening hours in your area.

The functions at a glance:
» Invite your friends to marktguru and get additional cashback credit.
» Search for individual products or brands and find out where they are currently on sale.
» Set your favorites and get notified as soon as there are new leaflets from your favorite retailers or your favorite products on offer.
» Put products directly from the brochure onto your shopping list and create your personal grocery list.
» Use promo codes to unlock exclusive cashback deals.

marktguru provides everything:
Leaflets and offers for many supermarkets, discounters, electro markets, hardware stores, sports shops, furniture stores, drugstores, organic markets, etc.
Current offers of various retailers, stores and shops, such as Kaufland, Aldi, Netto, Media Markt, Real, -, Norma, Müller Drogeriemarkt, Rossmann, Metro, Edeka, NKD, Saturn, Roller, McDonald's, Galeria Kaufhof, denn’s Biomarkt, Kentucky Fried Chicken, toom Getränkemarkt, Zoo & Co
The number and selection of the displayed leaflets vary, as it often depends upon the cooperation of the retailers.

Cashback for online purchases:
There are now cashback deals at numerous online shops available: OTTO, Saturn, Deichmann, Smyths Toys, Ernsting’s family, AliExpress, Lidl.de, Thalia, flaconi, Fressnapf, lieferando.de, ...

We work hard every day to show you more content and to further enhance your experience with the marktguru app. Your feedback is important to us!
You are still missing retailers, products or brands? Do you have questions, problems or feedback for us? Please contact us anytime at feedback@marktguru.de

We hope you enjoy the bargain hunting and saving money with the marktguru app.

Your marktgurus
descriptionShort: Don’t miss the best deals & offers for your next purchase.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
"The new shopping list was upgraded for you:
1) More info on list view
See the validty, price, retailer name and discounts on first sight. The item images increased in size.
2) swipe function
Left: Delete item instantly
Right: Set item as purchased/done
3) Open content
Tap the item image and get additional info for leaflets, offers, cashback deals or trigger a search for your free text entries.
4) Send list
Share your items with others via messenger, e-mail or other services."

title: marktguru - leaflets & offers

creator: marktguru Deutschland
descriptionHtml:
marktguru is your location based personal shopping companion. Discover the latest offers and flyers from stores near you and save money with cashback deals when shopping.

marktguru offers you numerous advantages:
» Leaflets, offers, promotions, catalogs, brochures, flyers and coupons from your favorite retailers - and that in an environmentally friendly way and without paper waste.
» Find the best offers and discounts.
» Cashback: save money quickly and easily.
This is how it works:
1) Select a cashback offer in the app
2) Buy a cashback product
3) Take a photo of the receipt and upload it to the app
4) Get cash back
» Opening hours: at marktguru you will find shops and chain stores as well as their opening hours in your area.

The functions at a glance:
» Invite your friends to marktguru and get additional cashback credit.
» Search for individual products or brands and find out where they are currently on sale.
» Set your favorites and get notified as soon as there are new leaflets from your favorite retailers or your favorite products on offer.
» Put products directly from the brochure onto your shopping list and create your personal grocery list.
» Use promo codes to unlock exclusive cashback deals.

marktguru provides everything:
Leaflets and offers for many supermarkets, discounters, electro markets, hardware stores, sports shops, furniture stores, drugstores, organic markets, etc.
Current offers of various retailers, stores and shops, such as Kaufland, Aldi, Netto, Media Markt, Real, -, Norma, Müller Drogeriemarkt, Rossmann, Metro, Edeka, NKD, Saturn, Roller, McDonald's, Galeria Kaufhof, denn’s Biomarkt, Kentucky Fried Chicken, toom Getränkemarkt, Zoo & Co
The number and selection of the displayed leaflets vary, as it often depends upon the cooperation of the retailers.

We work hard every day to show you more content and to further enhance your experience with the marktguru app. Your feedback is important to us!
You are still missing retailers, products or brands? Do you have questions, problems or feedback for us? Please contact us anytime at feedback@marktguru.de

We hope you enjoy the bargain hunting and saving money with the marktguru app.
